titles.title: Spirit of God in the clear

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1.Spirit of God in the clear running waters
blowing to greatness the trees on the hill
spirit of God in the finger of morning

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
fill the earth bringing it to birth and
blow where you will

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Blow blow blow till I be
but breath of the spirit blowing in me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
2.Down in the meadow the willows are mourning
sheep in the pasture land can not lay still
spirit of God creation is mourning

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
3.I saw the scar of a year that lay dying
heard the lament of a lone whippor will
spirit of God see that cloud crying

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
4.spirit of God everyone's heart is lonely
watching and waiting and hungry untill
spirit of God we long that you only
